title: “Open source” seeds loosen Big Ag’s grip on farmers
dot:
digraph OpenSourceSeeds{graph[label="Open Source Seeds: A Way Out of Big Ag's Grip", fontsize=16, labelloc="t", fontname="Arial"];node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];OSSI[label="Open Source Seed Initiative (OSSI)

(Bayer, Corteva, ChemChina)", style=filled, color=lightpink];Farmers[label="Farmers

Patents & Control", style=filled, color=lightcoral];OSSVarieties[label="OSSI Varieties
500+ Seeds: Squash, Rye, Tomatoes", style=filled, color=lightyellow];BigAg->Monopolies[label="Patents seeds"];Monopolies->Farmers[label="Restricts farmers"];Monopolies->Biodiversity[label="Threatens"];OSSI->Biodiversity[label="Protects"];OSSI->OSSVarieties[label="Provides open seeds"];OSSVarieties->Farmers[label="Empowers"];Farmers->Biodiversity[label="Saves seeds, shares knowledge"];Farmers->OSSI[label="Partners with OSSI"];OSSI->"Global Movement"[label="Spreading worldwide"];"Global Movement"[label="Global Open Source Seed Movement

title: Wi Flag (2002)
dot:
digraph WiFlag{node[shape=box];WiFlag[label="Wi Flag
(Concept of being targeted by creatures)"];History[label="History
- Players complained about bad luck
- Wi Flagged players targeted more frequently"];Developers[label="Developers' Response
- Initial denial of bug existence
- Investigation into targeting algorithm"];TargetingAlgorithm[label="Targeting Algorithm
- Creatures choose targets based on:
  - Last attacked
  - Last attacker
  - Random selection by distance"];Problem[label="Problem Found
- Random number generation issue
- Early InstanceID positions skew chances"];Resolution[label="Resolution
- Bug fixed in July 2002 Event
- Players can now experience peace"];WiFlag->History;WiFlag->Developers;Developers->TargetingAlgorithm;TargetingAlgorithm->Problem;Problem->Resolution;}
